item.description:
SINGLES MINGLE BAGEL BREAKFAST

We hope to see YOU !
Inviting all Jewish singles 40+,50+ and 60+
Come to our Singles Shmooze and Shmear Breakfast
Bagels, lox cream cheese, coffee and conversation

Sunday – January 10, 2010 10:00 am-12:00 noon
Temple Beth Am - 300 Pleasant Street – Framingham

Email~ singlesmingle18@aol.com now to make a reservation
Leave your name, your phone number, and number attending

RSVP by January 5th , so that we know how many bagels to get!
Cost - $7.00 with a reservation, $9.00 without a reservation/at the door

"BAGEL-RING" in the New Year with us !

Happy 2010!
item.name: Singles Mingle Bagel Breakfast - see "details" below
